data.helperPod.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: helper-pod
spec:
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  tolerations:
    - key: node.kubernetes.io/disk-pressure
      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

kind: Pod
metadata:

spec:

  tolerations:
    - key: node.kubernetes.io/disk-pressure
      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

kind: Pod
metadata:

spec:

      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
